minecraft:recipe_furnace.description: Represents a recipe for use with a Furnace.

tags.description: Item that can create the furnace recipe, such as 'furnace'.

input.description: Items used as input for the furnace recipe.

output.description: Items used as output for the furnace recipe.

minecraft:recipe_shaped.description: Represents a recipe that requires a dedicated pattern when using a Crafting Table.

tags.description: Item that can create the shaped recipe, such as 'crafting_table'.

priority.description: Sets the priority order of the recipe. Lower numbers represent a higher priority.

pattern.description: Characters that represent a pattern to be defined by keys

key.description: Keys to map characters to item names to be used in 'pattern'

result.description: When input items match the pattern then these items are the result.

minecraft:recipe_shapeless.description: Represents a recipe that does not require a dedicated pattern.

tags.description: Item that can create the shapeless recipe such as 'stonecutter'.

priority.description: Sets the priority order of the recipe. Lower numbers represent a higher priority.

ingredients.description: Items used as input (without a shape) for the recipe.

item.description: Provides the identifier for the result item

data.description: Sets the result item's data value

count.description: Sets how many of the result item should be output

minecraft:recipe_brewing_mix.description: Represents a recipe that for use with a Potion Brewing station.

tags.description: Item that can create the Brewing Container Recipe, such as 'brewing_stand'.

input.description: Input potion used in the brewing container recipe.

output.description: Output potion from the brewing container recipe.

reagent.description: Item used in the brewing container recipe with the input potion.

minecraft:recipe_brewing_container.description: Represents a recipe that for use with a Potion Brewing station.

tags.description: Item that can create the Brewing Container Recipe, such as 'brewing_stand'.

input.description: Input potion used in the brewing container recipe.

output.description: Output potion from the brewing container recipe.

reagent.description: Item used in the brewing container recipe with the input potion.
